basics.name: Rafael Sanabria Cruz
basics.label: Full Stack Developer with 10 years of experience
basics.summary: +10 years of experience as a Web Developer. I currently lead a team of developers for Telefónica de España and I am in constant training and growth. In recent years I have specialized in the development of web applications with NextJS, React and TailwindCSS. I am passionate about technology and I like to keep up to date with the latest trends in the world of web development. I am willing to take code tests to demonstrate experience and knowledge in different languages and frameworks.

work.name: Telefónica de España
work.summary: I started by initiating a new web project at Telefónica as the sole developer, and I have become the leader of a team of 8 developers. I have managed to implement good practices and code linting in the team, in addition to implementing GitFlow, Code Reviews, and the advanced use of libraries. During this time, I have taught courses on SaSS, Git and Gitflow, and advanced Javascript with jQuery.

work.name: Ayesa
work.summary: I have estimated and developed tasks, and performed fullstack maintenance of the Moodle platforms for the Department of Education of the Junta de Andalucía for secondary schools and language schools. I have modified themes and developed custom plugins for the platform.
highlights: Learning from scratch about the platform

work.name: E-xisto Diseño Web
work.summary: I developed e-commerce sites and custom web applications. During this time, I developed and deepened my knowledge in jQuery and HTML templates, as well as in layout with SaSS and Less languages from Sketch designs. I implemented RedSyS and Paypal payment gateways for multi-language sites.

work.name: Nuevos Desarrollos Tecnológicos
work.summary: I modified and implemented custom themes and plugins in Wordpress environments as a means of support in a research company. At the same time, I developed an MVP for a remote door control system with NFC where it was possible to control the permissions of different users for their smart locks using HTML, CSS, and jQuery.

education.title: Grado en Ingeniería Informática - Tecnologías Informáticas
